title: Bloodlord Vladimir
body: This skin should be updated since it's Vlads legendary skin or whatever cause with his VO he doesn't have any interactions with other champs so it would make this skin more fun to play if he had a lot more to say just like every other skin that has a VO with interactions

replies.body: I want at least a cool recall
Well yeah but no VO which is why I don't think they'd update that one instead :/
Yah its kinda crappy as is.
